turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, yes, I'd like order order coffee online from Peets.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want dark, medium, or light roast?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll try dark roasted this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you want drip, k-cup, press pot, or cold brew?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take drip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok want flavor do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take Cafe au Lait

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size small, medium, or large do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a large today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so far we have a large dark roast Cafe au Lait with almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, i'll pick it up at my regular Peets location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 1365 Park Street Alameda, CA 94501, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll call and order the coffe and call you back.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll get right back to you to confirm that your order is ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, I'm confirming that your Cafe au Lait is on order at 1365 Park Street Alameda, CA. and will be ready for pickup shortly and that your receipt will be sent to your iPhone via text message. Ok, thank you until next time.
